titles: A sermon preached at the funeral of Mr. Jos. Glanvil late rector of Bath, and chaplain in ordinary to His Majesty, who dyed at his rectory of Bath, the fourth of November, 1680, and was buried there the ninth of the same month / by Jos. Pleydell ...
author: Pleydell, Josiah, d. 1707.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
